text.tspan: Change of GDP per capita over the last generation in countries with a
high share in extreme poverty, 1990 to 2022

text.style: font-size: 14.625px; line-height: 1.2
text.tspan: GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and for price differences between countries, it is measured in constant international-$.

text.style: font-size: 13.5px; line-height: 1.2
